amendment.description: To require the authorization of appropriation of amounts for the development of new or modified nuclear weapons.

action.text: SA 2756 fell when SA 2700 ruled non-germane by the chair.

Amendment SA 2756 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2700. (consideration: CR S3595; text: CR S3595) To require the authorization of appropriation of amounts for the development of new or modified nuclear weapons.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2756 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 2700.
